subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees will have Mike Mussina’s services for two more seasons, at $23 million, but the Mets are still unsure if Tom Glavine will continue his pursuit of 300 victories in New York or Atlanta.
snippet: The Yankees will have Mike Mussina’s services for two more seasons, at $23 million, but the Mets are still unsure if Tom Glavine will continue his pursuit of 300 victories in New York or Atlanta.
